meanings.sent1: I will reloan some cash to my friend.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reloan the money to the borrower.
meanings.sent3: The bank loves to reloan money to trustworthy customers.
meanings.sent4: The generous lender always finds a way to reloan funds to those in need.
meanings.sent5: He made a promise to reloan the amount without any hesitation.

meanings.sent1: Can I reloan some money from you?
meanings.sent2: They had to reloan the amount for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: The siblings always reloan money from each other for emergencies.
meanings.sent4: She had to reloan the cash to cover the unexpected bill.
meanings.sent5: He will reloan the funds to pay off his debt.
